charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 35 months, a term of supervised release of 5 years, a special assessment fee of $100.00

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) - CONSPIRACY WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1)
21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 60 months, a term of supervised release for a term of 8 years, a special assessment fee of $100.00

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) - CONSPIRACY WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1)
21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 180 months, this sentence consists of a term of 120 months as to Count 1 and a term of 60 months as to Count 2, to be served consecutively; a term of supervised release for a term of 5 years, this term consists of 5 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently; a special assessment fee of $200.00

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(2)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 180 months, this sentence consists of a term of 120 months as to Count 1 and a term of 60 months as to Count 2, to be served consecutively; a term of supervised release for a term of 5 years, this term consists of 5 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently; a special assessment fee of $200.00
